description: Describes the permissions for a Amazon Web Services Systems Manager document (SSM document). If you created the document, you are the owner. If a document is shared, it can either be shared privately (by specifying a user's Amazon Web Services account ID) or publicly (All).

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the document for which you are the owner.

parameters.name: PermissionType
parameters.description: The permission type for the document. The permission type can be Share.

nested_items.name: AccountIds
nested_items.description: The account IDs that have permission to use this document. The ID can be either an Amazon Web Services account number or all.

nested_items.name: AccountSharingInfoList
nested_items.description: A list of Amazon Web Services accounts where the current document is shared and the version shared with each account.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID where the current document is shared.

nested_items.name: SharedDocumentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the current document shared with the account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
